head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Yonkers: Doctor Found Fatally Shot

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Yonkers: Doctor Found Fatally Shot

body.head.byline: By JENNIFER 8. LEE; Compiled by John Sullivan

abstract.p: Dr Leandro Lozado is found fatally shot in his Yonkers, NY, home; police find no signed of force entry (S)

block.p: A 46-year-old physician was found fatally shot on his bedroom floor yesterday afternoon, the Yonkers police said. The body of the physician, Dr. Leandro Lozada, who had a practice in the Bronx, was discovered by a friend around 3 p.m. at 43 Brendon Hill Road, the police said. They said that Dr. Lozada lived alone and that there was no sign of forced entry or a weapon.
